Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

SetReferralByAdmin(address,address).details: The event for set referral by admin. The referral is set in accordance with her referrer.

params.referral: The address of a referrer's referral.

SetReferrerByAdmin(address).details: The event for set referrer by Admin.

params.referrer: Address of a referrer added by Admin.

getReferralsOf(address).details: Gets referrals array of particular referrer

getReferralsOfLength(address).details: The amount of referrals for a particular referrer

register(bytes).details: Function to add new referral. Adds address that signed a hashed message as referrer

params._referrerSignature: Hash of MAGIC_MESSAGE signed by referrer

params.referralProgramUnits: Array of referrers with their referrals
